testCaseResult.testCaseName: Repository entity reference copy lifecycle test case
successfulAssertions: repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-00: OpenMetadataRoot entity type definition matches known type
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-01: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity created; repository supports storage of reference copies.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-02: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity can be retrieved as EntitySummary.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-03: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity can be retrieved as EntityDetail.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity matches the entity that was saved.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-05: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity has no relationships.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity status cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity status cannot be updated.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-08: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity type cannot be changed.
repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle-09: OpenMetadataRoot reference entity identity cannot be changed.
repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
unsuccessfulAssertions: Unexpected Exception Exception : CTS test repository-entity-reference-copy-lifecycle caught exception FunctionNotSupportedException from method purgeEntityReferenceCopy whilst trying to purge a reference copy of an entity of type OpenMetadataRoot.  Exception message was : OMRS-METADATA-COLLECTION-501-001 OMRSMetadataInstanceStore method purgeEntityReferenceCopy for OMRS Connector org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.repositoryservices.rest.repositoryconnector.OMRSRESTMetadataCollection to repository type REST-connected Repository https://localhost:9445/servers/SUT_Server is not implemented.  Method was invoked with parameters: entity : EntityDetail{entityProperties=null, properties=null, classifications=null, headerVersion=1, type=InstanceType{typeDefName='OpenMetadataRoot', typeDefCategory=TypeDefCategory{typeCode=6, typeName='EntityDef', typeDescription='An object or concept of interest.'}, typeDefGUID='4e7761e8-3969-4627-8f40-bfe3cde85a1d', typeDefVersion=1, typeDefDescription='Common root for all open metadata entity types.', typeDefDescriptionGUID='null', typeDefSuperTypes=null, validStatusList=[InstanceStatus{ordinal=15, name='Active', description='The instance is approved and in use.'}, InstanceStatus{ordinal=99, name='Deleted', description='The instance has been deleted and is no longer available.'}], validInstanceProperties=null}, instanceProvenanceType=InstanceProvenanceType{ordinal=1, name='Local to cohort', description='The instance is being maintained within one of the local cohort members.
